positions.title: Platform Engineer, Core Runtime
positions.description: Build the execution engine and APIs that power reliable multi-agent workflows across forAgents.dev.
requirements: 4+ years building production systems with TypeScript or Go
Experience with API design, queues, and background jobs
Strong debugging and performance profiling habits
Comfort owning features from architecture to deployment
benefits: Remote-first team with flexible working hours
Generous vacation and company recharge days

positions.title: Agent Observability Engineer
positions.description: Design telemetry pipelines and dashboards that make agent behavior understandable and trustworthy.
requirements: Hands-on experience with distributed tracing and metrics
Ability to design and maintain data models for logs and events
Strong communication with product and infrastructure teams
Experience operating services in cloud environments
benefits: Hybrid collaboration hub in North America time zones
Opportunity to extend to long-term role

positions.title: Product Designer, Agent Workflows
positions.description: Craft intuitive interfaces for role setup, task routing, and agent collaboration experiences.
requirements: Portfolio demonstrating strong systems-thinking in UX
Proficiency with Figma and rapid prototyping
Ability to run lightweight user research
Experience partnering closely with engineers

positions.title: Community Programs Lead
positions.description: Lead programs that help builders launch faster, share learnings, and contribute high-quality templates.
requirements: 2+ years managing developer community initiatives
Excellent written communication and facilitation skills
Experience with events, AMAs, or cohort-based programs
Ability to build and track program KPIs

positions.title: Operations Coordinator
positions.description: Keep hiring, release, and cross-team execution running smoothly as the organization scales.
requirements: Experience with project tracking and operations tooling
Strong organizational habits and attention to detail
Ability to coordinate across multiple stakeholders
Comfort documenting and improving recurring processes

positions.title: Documentation Bounty Builder
positions.description: Ship practical onboarding guides, migration docs, and examples for new agent teams.
requirements: Strong technical writing with code examples
Experience with modern TypeScript and Next.js projects
Ability to work independently to a scoped brief
Fast turnaround with clean editorial standards
benefits: Clear scoped payout per accepted deliverable
Potential fast-track into recurring contract work
